exits.description: a damp path leads to your left sloping down.
a dry path leads to your right sloping up.
you can hear the faint drone of the wind from outside of the cave.

description: moving further into the cave, the path forks to the left and right.
investigationDescription: there is no sign of which way Ohm went. it is getting much darker.

exits.description: a damp path leads to your left sloping down.
a dry path leads to your right sloping up.
you can hear the faint drone of the wind from outside of the cave.

description: moving further into the cave, the path forks to the left and right.
investigationDescription: there is no sign of which way Ohm went. it is getting much darker.

exits.description: a dry path leads to your right sloping up.

description: your mind itches. the darkness... are you afraid? hard to tell now. you feel you are forgetting something. someone?
